{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:06.400

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:12.800

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:26.239

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:30.800

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:37.960

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:42.079

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = more conservative and voted every way and vetoed every bill that I didn't like.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:53.599
    | text      = So this is a fascinating point here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:55.719

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:11.880

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:48.599
    | text      = in her personally, and more of a person who actually knows how to convey her point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:52.320
    | text      = I want to talk for a second about UNESCO, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:55.639
    | text      = The organization was founded in 1946, and the United States was a founding member.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:00.599
    | text      = In 1984, during the Reagan administration, the US withdrew from UNESCO, and it's historically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:05.840
    | text      = a fairly open question about whether or not that was an appropriate decision.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:10.320
    | text      = There were some complaints of mismanagement by the then director general, so it might
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:13.960
    | text      = have been a totally, it might not have been a totally frivolous decision.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:17.760
    | text      = But either way, in 1995, we'd seen a change in leadership at UNESCO, and a renewed interest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:23.320
    | text      = in rejoining.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:24.880
    | text      = President Clinton indicated that he wanted to rejoin at this point, but he was limited
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:28.239
    | text      = in his ability to do so by budgetary constraints.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:31.599
    | text      = As he left office, he requested that Bush rejoin, which he did in late 2003.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:36.920
    | text      = It's true that Bush was inclined to rejoin, but he honestly couldn't have done it on his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:40.880
    | text      = own unilaterally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:42.760
    | text      = In order to join, funding had to be appropriated, which was done by an act of Congress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:47.340
    | text      = It wasn't the act of one person, because the action needed to be, you know, the action
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:51.639
    | text      = needed other things to make it happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:54.039
    | text      = There were multiple parts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:55.199
    | text      = There were like, there's like more than one branch of government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:58.679
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:59.679
    | text      = And it goes through, it goes through.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:00.679
    | text      = And they do different things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:01.679
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:02.679
    | text      = So the story of UNESCO as it relates to the United States is actually a bit of a bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:06.360
    | text      = Ron Paul tried to get the US out of it every year he was in the House, and each time it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:10.360
    | text      = went nowhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:11.639
    | text      = But then, in 2011, UNESCO allowed Palestine in as a member state, and that was a huge
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:17.079
    | text      = problem for the United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:19.119
    | text      = At that point, we just decided to stop paying dues to UNESCO, and in 2013, they stripped
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:23.860
    | text      = the United States of voting rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:26.119
    | text      = Then in 2017, Trump's State Department announced we were going to be withdrawn again, and when
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:29.960
    | text      = we left, we owed over $600 million in unpaid dues.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:34.599
    | text      = I think the United States-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:35.599
    | text      = It sounds like Trump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:36.599
    | text      = It's a great, great-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:38.639
    | text      = We're cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:39.639
    | text      = Great roommate for the rest of the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:41.119
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:42.119
    | text      = I think we're best bros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:43.119
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:44.119
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:45.119
    | text      = The other thing is that Bush signing on to UNESCO isn't some kind of a single event that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:48.840
    | text      = happened, entirely motivated by Bush himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:51.320
    | text      = It's a piece of a larger picture that Alex just doesn't handle, he just refuses to deal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:55.619
    | text      = with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:56.619
    | text      = Yeah, and it's a really depressing picture, you know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:59.719
    | text      = It's a really dumb picture that it's entirely possible that Nancy Reagan's astrologist told
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:05.280
    | text      = Ronald fucking, I got soup for brains that we should get out of UNESCO, and that's all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:11.219
    | text      = that you needed to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:12.219
    | text      = Yeah, I understand why you're saying that, but just in the interest of total fairness,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:16.280
    | text      = the arguments at that point in the 80s for getting out were more sensible than a lot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:24.039
    | text      = of other decisions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:25.039
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:26.039
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:27.039
    | text      = But yeah, at this point, Ann is starting to get a little bit, I guess she's just realizing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:34.199
    | text      = where she is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:35.199
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:36.199
    | text      = And it's kind of like, oh, this isn't good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:38.159
    | text      = I thought I was going to be promoting my book.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:40.320
    | text      = She had no idea who Alex is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:42.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:43.039
    | text      = It's pretty clear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:44.039
    | text      = It's very obvious that she really thought this was going to be a boilerplate radio appearance
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:48.840
    | text      = just like the-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:49.840
    | text      = An interview with a right-wing radio person about her book.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:53.440
    | text      = The safest possible thing for Ann Coulter to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:56.440
    | text      = Yeah, and now Alex decides, aha, she's annoyed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:59.800
    | text      = Got her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:00.800
    | text      = I'm going to taunt her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:01.800
    | text      = Now's a good time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:10.000
    | text      = We could do lots of things, we could spend six hours doing this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:13.000
    | text      = Yeah, we could.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:47.760

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:01.260
    | text      = She got to her position of professional troll with the talent to become a professional douchebag.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:09.360
    | text      = Yeah, and seeing it used against Alex, it softens it a little bit, but it's still just-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:17.719
    | text      = It does make you feel like maybe there's a certain time to tap into being a dick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:23.239
    | text      = When the time is right, you should have the powers of douchebaggery under your belt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:28.099
    | text      = That rejoinder of like, I've never seen you this mad at liberals, I'm just bored, is like-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:32.360
    | text      = Yeah, that's solid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:33.639

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:34.639
    | text      = Exactly the poke you need to poke back at Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.019
    | text      = You're not going to break through that at the dinner table.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:40.480
    | text      = So we get to the Patriot Act II after this, and he was like, what about this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:44.760

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:45.760

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Patriot Act II has secret arrest of citizens for no reason, liability protection to police
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = and military to act domestically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:56.280
    | text      = I mean, this is stuff Bill Clinton tried to get passed in his omnibus crime bill and failed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:02.079
    | text      = Section 213 means they can break in your house without a warrant, take whatever they want,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = plant whatever they want in any criminal investigation, even if it's non-terrorism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:10.159

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:41.960
    | text      = Love it.

}}

    | text      = It is really fun, though, when she clarifies that she hadn't read what he's talking about

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
